# PlantAPI Project
Hello! I'm a junior developer and, to train myself, I'm developing this Spring API. The goal is to manage a large amount of information about plants (maybe not all of them). I also manage users to create accounts and specific queries between the two.

# Languages and tools

For high-quality development, I used powerful tools like SonarCloud, Jacoco, and CheckStyle. As mentioned earlier, the main goal is to practice, so I tried to resolve all reported issues and test all the components I added in different ways.

I want to create some professional files to explain how the API work but for the moment the documentation is in work in progress. So be patient but you can ask i will try to answer you.
